attributes.action: End the out of dated school sytem and find a new way which builds on creativity
attributes.additional_details: Schools main target is to prepare students for the future. Yet we are not taught skills such as taxes which we are going to frequantly use in later life. Instead we are taught topics which we forget easily and that mostly are not applied in life. We in lessons are force fed imformation and we through it up on a test thats not education thats bulimia. However memorising a fact is their any point in that? We have google and siri. Times are changing and school needs to change to shapethe the future

Despite the inudustrial ages end the school system has not changed in the slightest. We need a new system which encoroges creativity and truly prepares students for the future

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a petition that explains what sort of new school system you would like to replace the current one, or you could call for the Government to launch an inquiry into the schools system to change how people learn.
